capabilities.headline: Everything you need to run
capabilities.description1: Ready-made software designed for shoe and optical stores.
capabilities.description2: Get started in minutes — no custom development needed.
capabilities.paragraph1: Our retail software solutions are built specifically for shoe stores and optical stores. We understand the unique challenges of retail management and have created tools that make running your store easier, more efficient, and more profitable.
capabilities.paragraph2: From inventory tracking to sales analytics, customer management to reporting — everything you need is included. No complex setup, no lengthy implementation. Just powerful software that works from day one.

inventoryManagement.title: Inventory Management
inventoryManagement.description: Track stock levels, manage suppliers, and never run out of products

salesAnalytics.title: Sales Analytics
salesAnalytics.description: Real-time insights into your sales performance and customer trends

customerManagement.title: Customer Management
customerManagement.description: Build lasting relationships with comprehensive customer records and history

about.headline: Retail software
about.paragraph1: We've built J Store and J Optics because we understand retail. These aren't generic solutions — they're purpose-built software designed specifically for shoe stores, optical stores, and their suppliers. Every feature is crafted with your daily operations in mind.
about.paragraph2: Whether you're a retailer managing inventory for a shoe store, handling prescriptions at an optical shop, or a supplier coordinating with multiple retail partners, our software adapts to your workflow. Simple to use, powerful enough to scale, and always improving based on real feedback from retailers and suppliers.
about.ctaDescription: See how our retail software can transform your business operations.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and plans

pricing.question: What's included in each plan?
pricing.answer: All plans include our core features: inventory management, sales tracking, invoices, analytics, POS system, and customer management. Professional and Enterprise plans include additional features like advanced analytics, integrations, and priority support.

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Basic and Professional plans can be set up in minutes. We provide step-by-step guidance and support to get you started quickly. Enterprise plans may require custom configuration and typically take a few days.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: All plans include email support. Professional plans get priority support with faster response times. Enterprise plans include dedicated account management and 24/7 support with SLA guarantees.

payment.question: How do I pay?
payment.answer: We accept various payment methods. Monthly plans are billed automatically. You can cancel or change your plan at any time through your account settings.

trial.question: Do you offer a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial period so you can explore all features before committing. Contact us to learn more about our trial options.

custom.question: Can I customize my plan?
custom.answer: Enterprise plans include custom development and features tailored to your needs. For Basic and Professional plans, contact us to discuss custom requirements.
